messages.title: On 7 May, make your vote for the common good.
messages.content: I am challenging Harriet Harman, deputy leader vs. deputy leader, to show that only the Green Party is committed to delivering a fair, equitable and sustainable society. The other parties offer only austerity, inequality and unsustainable growth that benefits the top 1%. The Green Party offers a true alternative. I will stand up for our community and our environment.

issues.economy: The other parties offer only austerity, inequality and unsustainable growth that benefits the top 1%.
issues.environment: I will stand up for our community and our environment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am challenging Harriet Harman, deputy leader vs. deputy leader, to show that only the Green Party is committed to delivering a fair, equitable and sustainable society.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Remco van der Stoep on behalf of Amelia Womack, both at 42 Elm Grove, London SE15 5DE.

images.caption: Green Party - For real change in Camberwell and Peckham

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on recycled card by A Local Printer, 18 Robell Way, Water Lane Trading Est, Storrington RH20 3DN.
